title: Fabrication of a novel graphene oxide based magnetic nanocomposite and its usage as a highly effectual catalyst for the construction of N,N′-alkylidene bisamides
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25235-25246
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04136D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Abdolkarim Zare, Marziyeh Barzegar, Esmael Rostami, Ahmad Reza Moosavi-Zare
A novel graphene oxide-based magnetic nanocomposite namely nano-[GO@Fe3O4@R-NHMe2][HSO4] was fabricated, characterized and applied in the solvent-free construction of N,N′-alkylidene bisamides from aryl aldehydes (1 eq.) and primary amides (2 eq.).
